ygData.subject: RE: Offtopic: Come back!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh heh.  I do try to include (meta) or (OT) in the subject lines of these things so people uninterested in them can skip them.  There just seem to be a
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 16 Jul 1999, Mike Roach wrote:
>
> Is it just me being a pain in the arse, or is our quaint little bard list
> gone totally off topic with Asheron's Call, Trade Skills, Druid and other
> class discussions, etc? Did someone drop a General Topic EQVault bomb on
> us?

Heh heh. I do try to include (meta) or (OT) in the subject
lines of these things so people uninterested in them can skip
them. There just seem to be a lot of very intelligent people
on this list who seem eager to discuss meta-game issues. I'll
start sending replies to the individual instead of the list.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
